data.actual_result: the uild list jumps up around one guild icon height
data.expected_result: the list of guilds you are in stays still
data.short_description: scrolling to the bottom of your guild list with a server outage causes the list to jump up some
data.steps_to_repro: - have a server outage - scroll to the bottom of the list of servers - wait around 2 seconds or less
